extendedInfo.description: This is the free version of Soccer Strategy Board.The pay version allows for saving of boards, changing of fields, and has no ads.  Features: - Option to lock Xs and Os in place when drawing. - Undo of last 10 drawings.Pay version: - Save and load boards. - Change fields. - No ads.

reviews.title: Great developer support
reviews.comment: The program would force close on galaxy tab 10.1, emailed developer and was fixed in days, now purchasing the full version, it\'s a good program, with great support!
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Ethan
reviews.comment: Great although im young i can stradegise with my team
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Great!
reviews.comment: Great app. Does what it\'s suppose to do. Add player colors would be nice.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Players can be reset to the middle
reviews.comment: Its ok but you cant reset the players to the center

reviews.comment: This free version is awesome, but the pay version doesn\'t work, fix it it keeps foreclosing, add more features
